title: goplan9 tree is not goinstall-compatible
body:
Exemple:
goinstall -clean goplan9.googlecode.com/hg/plan9/acme

will output:
goinstall: package dependency cycle
	goplan9.googlecode.com/hg/plan9/acme ->
	goplan9.googlecode.com/hg/plan9/acme

because (I suppose) Dict.go is seen by goinstall as part of the package while it is
simply a standalone program which happens to depend on the package.

Maybe you don't consider that a bug, and you just want to encourage people not to leave
programs in package directories (which sounds fine to me)?

6g
ubuntu 10.04
93ec29b1b3cc+ tip
